about_the_game:
GAME DESCRIPTION

Pizza Simulator is a cooperative multiplayer pizzeria simulator where each player gets to experience managing their own restaurant. Oversee every aspect of running a pizzeria: set up the kitchen with modern equipment, hire and train staff, prepare a variety of dishes, serve customers, and handle payments.

Main Goal – Create a perfectly functioning establishment where everything runs smoothly, and the reputation continually rises. Keep an eye on your pizzeria's rating and condition, competing for customer attention and maintaining your standing in a competitive environment. Expand your delivery fleet and ensure timely delivery of orders. Additionally, maintain order in the dining area, preventing unscrupulous guests from leaving without paying.

Play solo or invite friends to develop the business together and succeed in the challenging world of the restaurant industry!

MAKE DELICIOUS PIZZA

Pay close attention to each ingredient – your goal is to win over the hearts (and appetites) of all your customers!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Dive into the experience alone or with friends. Invite them to help you grow and decorate your pizzeria!

CREATE A UNIQUE INTERIOR

Arrange furniture and kitchen equipment to your taste, organize convenient storage for ingredients, and keep the dining area clean.

DELIVER PIZZA STRAIGHT TO CUSTOMERS

Develop a delivery fleet and hire couriers to get your pizza to every doorstep.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD R9 270X
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 11
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Pizza Simulator is a cooperative simulator where you manage a pizzeria, set up the kitchen, hire staff, prepare and deliver orders, and maintain the reputation and cleanliness of your establishment. Create your dream pizzeria!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
